articles.title: Shraddha Kapoor keeps it stylish in casuals as she returns from Maldives, cuts birthday cake with paps; PHOTOS - PINKVILLA
articles.description: Shraddha Kapoor was snapped at the Mumbai airport today as she made her way back from the Maldives. The Baaghi 3 star celebrated her birthday there with rumoured beau Rohan Shrestha and today, as she returned, the paps arranged a cake at the airport for her.
